titles.title: Nankoufuraku no Maoujou e Youkoso: Debuff wa Fuyou to Yuusha Party wo Oidasareta Kuro Madoushi, Maougun no Saikou Kanbu ni Mukaerareru

Welcome to the Impregnable Demon King Castle: The Black Sorcerer Is Offered a Seat as a Member of the Demon King Army's Top Brass After Being Kicked Out of the Hero's Party Because They Didn't Need Debuffs
難攻不落の魔王城へようこそ～デバフは不要と勇者パーティーを追い出された黒魔導士、魔王軍の最高幹部に迎えられる～
The Impregnable Demon King's Castle and the Expelled Black Mage of the Hero's Party

title: Nankoufuraku no Maoujou e Youkoso: Debuff wa Fuyou to Yuusha Party wo Oidasareta Kuro Madoushi, Maougun no Saikou Kanbu ni Mukaerareru
title_english: The Impregnable Demon King's Castle and the Expelled Black Mage of the Hero's Party
title_japanese: 難攻不落の魔王城へようこそ～デバフは不要と勇者パーティーを追い出された黒魔導士、魔王軍の最高幹部に迎えられる～
title_synonyms: Welcome to the Impregnable Demon King Castle: The Black Sorcerer Is Offered a Seat as a Member of the Demon King Army's Top Brass After Being Kicked Out of the Hero's Party Because They Didn't Need Debuffs
synopsis:
In the present era, adventurers, demons, heroes, and demon lord, are no longer occupations that put one's lives at stake. With the world at peace, it is an era where conquering dungeons has been transformed into entertainment. Adventurers and monsters are able to fight with a substitute body made of magic, popularizing dungeon conquests with no deaths. Having lost his job, the "Black Mage" Remme struggled with finding another party until one day a beautiful woman appeared before him telling she had a job for him.

(Source: Comikey Media)
background: Nankoufuraku no Maoujou e Youkoso: Debuff wa Fuyou to Yuusha Party wo Oidasareta Kuro Madoushi, Maougun no Saikou Kanbu ni Mukaerareru has been published digitally in English as The Impregnable Demon King's Castle and the Expelled Black Mage of the Hero's Party through Comikey since June 17, 2022, and by Square Enix through Manga UP!
